thread.title: Direct Phone Numbers Of White House Staff Have Been Leaked
thread.title_full: Direct Phone Numbers Of White House Staff Have Been Leaked

author: Perez Hilton
title: Direct Phone Numbers Of White House Staff Have Been Leaked

organizations.name: direct phone numbers of white house

text:
1/31/2017 6:39   Politik • Donald Trump 
People will be heard, whether the government likes it or not! 
With everything that's going on in the United States — from the Muslim ban to "alternative facts" — the American public is demanding that President Donald Trump and his constituents listen to their concerns and demands. 
Related: Sally Yates Is On The RIGHT SIDE Of History! 
On Tuesday, an anonymous group leaked a long list of direct phone numbers of several White House personnel in order for people to air their grievances to the officials they elected! 
The concerned collective created a website called "White House Comment Line" which aims to enforce "open communication" as a "cornerstone of a good democracy." 
Surprisingly, their source of inspiration came from Donnie himself! According to their page: 
"In his inaugural address, Donald Trump said that all people would be heard under his administration. 'The forgotten men and women of our country will be forgotten no longer,' he proclaimed. 'Everyone is listening to you now.' While Trump's staff is still learning how to use their computers, our intention is to help them fulfill his promise of transparency by providing the people with an additional way to be heard."' 
Apparently, a good chunk of numbers STILL work! To see the list, go HERE !
